Key Match Events: Sikandar Raza scored 34 (24) and was caught by Suryakumar Yadav
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma praised Suryakumar Yadav's performance and the team's all-round effort
Craig Ervine suggested changes in strategy for future matches
Suryakumar Yadav expressed satisfaction with his team's performance and the atmosphere in the team
India will face England in the semi-final
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won Group 2 and qualified for the semi-finals
The Super 12s are completed, and the semi-finals are set
Suryakumar Yadav is named Player of the Match
